intro: Psychotria stenocalyx, commonly known as the narrow-leaf Psychotria, is a flowering plant native to tropical regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It typically grows as an understory shrub in humid, shaded environments. Psychotria stenocalyx is also known for its psychoactive properties due to the presence of alkaloids such as psychotamine.
